content.description:
From Left to Right: 

Easy Gully, WI1-2: Obvious easy snow gully far left   Black Sunshine, WI3+/4: First flow right of Easy Gully, starts halfway up EG.   Dominatrix, II, M6 WI4+: Starts at the base of EG. Bottom is mixed.   French Tickler, M6 A0 WI4: Another rare former. Mixed start.   Scream Queen, M5 WI4+: Rarely in ice conditions, 30 feet right of Dominatrix. 

Grand Illusion, WI4+: Starts right of the center buttress at bolts   Three Sheets, II, WI4   Grand Contusion, WI3+ 

Poster Child, WI4/4+ M4: Farthest right climb. 500 feet right and downhill from Grand Illusion. Short mixed section. 

800+ Feet right of Easy Gully:

Grand Confusion, WI3+: From a text description it may sound like Grand Illiusion. This really isn't a part of Easy Gully, it's a 10-minute hike north of Easy Gully.
